com.sap.integration.utils

Class UrlBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sap.integration.utils.UrlBuilder

  • public class UrlBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Class, which dynamically creates URL, encodes query parameters by HTTP encoding, converts string URL to various type of objects.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static org.apache.log4j.Logger LOG 
      private java.lang.StringBuilder query
      Variable, which stores information about query parameters.
      private java.lang.StringBuilder urlPath
      Variable, which stores information about path.

    • Method Detail

      • append

        public UrlBuilder append(java.lang.String value)
        Method append value to "path" part of URL. It is not append to "query" part of URL.
        Parameters:
        value - - value which will be appended
        Returns:
        this - instance of UrlBuilder

      • parameter

        public UrlBuilder parameter(java.lang.String parameter,
                   java.lang.Number value)
        Method appends query parameter with value to query part of URL. Method automatically determines, whether parameter is first or not and use ? or & for concatenation of query parameters and values. It also encodes entered value (not parameter!).
        Parameters:
        parameter -
        value -
        Returns:
        this - instance of UrlBuilder

      • parameter

        public UrlBuilder parameter(java.lang.String parameter,
                   java.lang.String value)
        Method appends query parameter with value to query part of URL. Method automatically determines, whether parameter is first or not and use ? or & for concatenation of query parameters and values. It also encodes entered value (not parameter!).
        Parameters:
        parameter -
        value -
        Returns:
        this - instance of UrlBuilder

        URL as instance of URL
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException
